body: Doujin are lacking of common sense.
why you changed her (death mother) hairsytle, now she cant die properly. she will happy if she die and she know it. you are an asshole artis. damn, i need good storyy, not mainstream -__-

so cute and sexy love the side ponytail and OL outfit! saikou !
@The Real America you should learn how different reality from fantasy first. I mean c'mon, you can't just mix reality and comics like that.
@just me    I guess that's true, I shouldn't look too deeply into it.

@The Real America...this might be just my personal opinion, but you shouldn't mix reality with fantasy...The way I see it, it's just business, if people buy it, then they make it...I feel like some people here just take shit too personally...Seriously, just look for works that fit your taste and don't waste your time on shit that you don't like...you'll have to accept that there's no answer that would justify NTR, and yet, some people will like it (some less and some more)

Asking here because why not: Why are Japanese men perceived as weak and spineless? In almost every NTR doujinshi, they never fight back and in some cases encourage their women to be violated by other men. I read somewhere that women in Japan are becoming more assertive and in a traditionally conservative society, men don't know how to handle it and thus aren't as compatible with their women anymore. I don't know ANYONE in real life that would ever let this happen. Cheating? Sure, but the shit that goes on in these comics? Never.
